attributes.action: Ban all Dogs from Sports pitches in Wales
attributes.additional_details: To prevent dog walkers taking their dogs on sports pitches and fining them if caught. Give parking ticket wardens and PCSOs the power to give on the spot fines whilst out on their duties.
attributes.background: Keeping active, fit and healthy is good for everyone. With Children, youth and adults playing community sports on sports pitches we need these to be free of anything that could cause harm. The most common barrier found on sports pitches is Dog Feces. We need instant fines for dog walkers on fields.

rejection.details: Given its focus on sports pitches in Wales, you may wish to submit your petition to the Welsh Parliament, which has its own Petitions Committee. You can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
